channel.title: Projects on Volak Sin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Volak Sin

item.title: Workers' Compensation Estimator
item.description: Created a tool that estimates workers compensation claims(MSE~$30k)to help company predict future claims Engineered features from text to help determine specific types of injuries Optimized Linear Lasso, Randon Forest Regressors and XgBoost using GridSearch CV SUMMARY & INSIGHTS The project task involved analyzing workers’ compensation data. As with most insurance-related data, the distribution of past claims in the training set was highly skewed with a max claim of 3.

item.title: The Secret Behind Warren Buffet's Words
item.description: Warren Buffet is arguably the greatest investor of all time. He is so revered among investors and shareholders that his annual stockholders’ meeting is filled up with stadiums of people; all waiting to hear what the chairman has to say. We took that interest in Warren’s words one step further. We will analyze every word that Warren has written in Berkshire’s annual report and try to make future predictions off them.
